title: Nice! Burger King Offers 'Adult Toys' With Adults-Only Meal! | Qui West | 99.1 KGGI
text:
Nice! Burger King Offers 'Adult Toys' With Adults-Only Meal! posted by Qui West - share 
"If you think Burger King isn't a romantic enough destination for a Valentine's Day date, it's willing to sweeten the deal with a couple of beers and a sex toy. In a deal being offered only in Israel, and only after 6pm on Tuesday, the chain is selling an "Adults Meal" that comes with two Whoppers and two packs of fries, as well as the beers and the "adult toy," SOURCE Qui West began his radio journey in 2006 as an intern in San Francisco where he developed a love for radio. From there, he became a public affairs host and landed a weekend on air spot with KYLD Wild 949. The he hit the majors and worked at Houston's legendary hip hop station KBXX 979 The Box. Qui West hosted the No.1 rated night show in the market for almost 4 years. Most recently, he was home in San Francisco at KRBQ 102. Now he has a new home, right here in the I.E. on 99.1 KGGI. Join him every afternoon from 2-6p and follow him everywhere @QuiWest. Contact
